alert.note: Alert for Bay; Huron; Midland; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Tuscola, Bay, southwestern Huron and Midland Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Sebewaing to near Linwood to near Coleman. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Linwood around 525 PM EDT. Auburn around 530 PM EDT. Kawkawlin around 545 PM EDT. Bay City, Sebewaing and Sanford around 555 PM EDT. Unionville around 600 PM EDT. Essexville around 605 PM EDT. Akron and Munger around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Colling, Wisner, Bay Port, Crump, Poseyville, Willard, Laporte, Averill, Gordonville and Bombay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
